bibl.title: The Alexandrian Coinage of Caligula.
Aegyptiaca serta in Soheir Bakhoum memoriam. Mélanges de numismatique, d'iconographie et d'histoire

bibl.note: Coins probably incorrectly attributed to Caligula. - Coins doubtfully attributed to Caligula. - Definite coins of Caligula. - Coin incorrectly attributed to Caesonia. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Andrew Burnett, The Alexandrian Coinage of Caligula.

Dominique Gerin, Angelo Geissen & Michel Amandry (edd.), Aegyptiaca serta in Soheir Bakhoum memoriam. Mélanges de numismatique, d'iconographie et d'histoire = Collezioni numismatiche. 7 (Milano, 2008) pp. 45-47.
Coins probably incorrectly attributed to Caligula. - Coins doubtfully attributed to Caligula. - Definite coins of Caligula. - Coin incorrectly attributed to Caesonia. - Conclusion.
